dcterms:creator: I. DokmaniÂ´c
R. Parhizkar
A. Walther
Y. M. Lu
M. Vetterli
dcterms:description: The Room Impulse Response (RIR) dataset is used to reconstruct a convex polyhedral room from impulse responses, exploiting the properties of Euclidean distance matrices (EDMs) in the general 3D case.
dcterms:title: Room Impulse Response (RIR)

dcterms:creator: E. Vera
D. Lucio
L. A. Fernandes
L. Velho
dcterms:description: The D-KHT dataset is utilized for real-time plane detection in depth images, clustering the point cloud into approximately co-planar clusters.
dcterms:title: D-KHT (Depth Kernel-based Hough Transform)

dcterms:creator: M. A. Fischler
R. C. Bolles
dcterms:description: The Random Sample Consensus (RANSAC) dataset is referenced for model fitting in point cloud shape detection, although its limitations are discussed in the context of the proposed methods.
dcterms:title: Random Sample Consensus (RANSAC)

dcterms:creator: N. Kiryati
Y. Eldar
A. M. Bruckstein
dcterms:description: The Probabilistic Hough Transform dataset is mentioned as a computationally demanding approach for model fitting, which is adapted in the proposed methods.
dcterms:title: Probabilistic Hough Transform

dcterms:creator: A. Yla-Jaaski
N. Kiryati
dcterms:description: The Adaptive Probabilistic Hough Transform dataset is referenced for its adaptive termination of voting in the probabilistic circular Hough transform.
dcterms:title: Adaptive Probabilistic Hough Transform

dcterms:creator: L. Xu
E. Oja
P. Kultanen
dcterms:description: The Randomized Hough Transform dataset is mentioned as a new curve detection method that uses a randomized approach for selecting points from the point cloud.
dcterms:title: Randomized Hough Transform
